verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> all the <S%H2416>animals,<s%> and all the <S%H929>livestock<s%> that were with him in the <S%H8392>ship;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5674>made<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7918>subsided.<s%>

The <S%H8415>deep<s%>'s <S%H4599>fountains<s%> and the <S%H8064>sky<s%>'s <S%H699>windows<s%> were also <S%H5534>stopped,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> was <S%H3607>restrained.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>receded<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1980>continually.<s%> After the <S%H7097>end<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2637>decreased.<s%>

The <S%H8392>ship<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6240>seventeenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> on <S%H780>Ararat<s%>'s <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> receded <S%H1980>continually<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%> In the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H259>month,<s%> on the first day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H7200>seen.<s%>
It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made,<s%>
and he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> a <S%H6158>raven.<s%> It <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>back<s%> and <S%H7725>forth,<s%> until the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He sent <S%H7971>out<s%> a <S%H3123>dove<s%> from <S%H7200>him,<s%> to see if the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7043>abated<s%> from the surface of the <S%H127>ground,<s%>

but the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> no place to <S%H4494>rest<s%> <S%H3709>her<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and she <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him into the <S%H8392>ship;<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%> He put <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and took <S%H3947>her,<s%> and brought her to him into the <S%H8392>ship.<s%>
He <S%H2342>stayed<s%> yet <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3254>again<s%> he sent the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H7971>out<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship.<s%>

The <S%H3123>dove<s%> came <S%H935>back<s%> to him at <S%H6256>evening,<s%> <S%H6310>and,<s%> behold, in her mouth was an <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> plucked <S%H2965>off.<s%> So <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7043>abated<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H3176>stayed<s%> yet another <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and sent <S%H7971>out<s%> the <S%H3123>dove;<s%> and she <S%H3254>didn't<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to him any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> first <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month,<s%> the first day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H2717>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked.<s%> He saw that the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H2717>dried.<s%>
In the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on <S%H7651>the<s%> <S%H6242>twenty-seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H3001>dry.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> <S%H802>you,<s%> and your wife, and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' wives with <S%H802>you.<s%>

Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> with you every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that is with you of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> including <S%H5775>birds,<s%> <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that they may breed <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> went <S%H1121>out,<s%> with his sons, his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' wives with <S%H802>him.<s%>

Every <S%H2416>animal,<s%> every creeping <S%H7431>thing,<s%> and every <S%H5775>bird,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship.<s%>

<S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal,<s%> and of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>bird,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7306>smelled<s%> the <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> any more for <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H5668>sake,<s%> because the <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth;<s%> neither will I ever <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> everything <S%H2416>living,<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done.<s%>

While the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3117>remains,<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> time and <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and <S%H7120>cold<s%> and <S%H2527>heat,<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter,<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> shall not <S%H7673>cease.<s%>"
